The total number of enumerable combinations is:



$$C_{tot}= \sum_{k=0}^{N} C(N,k)=2^{N}-1$$


where *N* is the total number of items and *k* the desidered number of components in the combination.


For more theoretical details see:

[Introductory Combinatorics (5th Edition), Brualdi RA](http://www.pearsonhighered.com/educator/product/Introductory-Combinatorics/9780136020400.page)
